title: EcoStinger® Women Full Body Swimsuit Stinger Suit UV Protection UPF50+ Black Lavender
features: Fabric soft on skin 53% Polyester/47% PBT; Light weight: 170gsm.
UPF50+ Sun Protection Blocking over 97.5% of the sun UVA and UVB. Protect your skin against sunburns and damage effect from the sun UV rays.
Suitable for all type of water sports activities, including swimming in indoor and outdoor water pools, and sea and ocean waters.
Chlorine Resistant; Perfect body fit; fast drying, Matt finish, retain its original shape with excellent stretch and recovery functions.
Compression design yet very comfortable to wear, include flat-lock stitching on side and panels for more support and enhancing performance.
Protect the skin against box jellyfish stingers, sea lice and other sea creatures, Feel safe while enjoying your beach and swimming activities.
description: For best fit refer to sizing table image; start with Torso measurements and refer to height and weight references if necessary.

Excellent stretch full body stinger suit dive skin Style with front zipper for easier donning, very comfortable and soft on the skin, Provide UVA/UVB and jellyfish protection; Chlorine resistant fabric maintain colors and elasticity makes it ideal for use in chlorinated pools; suitable for outdoor and indoor water sports activities, including swimming, water jumping, underwater swimming, light diving and all type of water fun activities.
: UPF50+ blocks >97.5% of the sun UV radiation, protect against Jellyfish Stingers, Sea Lice and Sandfly;
: Anti-Chafe due to its Flatlock stitching design; Chlorine Resistant retain colors and elasticity for the life of the product; Quick drying;
: Suitable for warm and lukewarm water temperature 20°C / 70°F, also can be used in colder waters and/or heated pools;
: Can be used during hot, mild or cool weather, fabric is light weight and breathable keeping your skin cool even in hot weather conditions;
: Extremely durable with excellent stretch and recovery functions;
: Preferred cold water hand wash, if machine wash use cold water only.
